short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to find status(prev_battery_level and charging status) of Jiofi when connected, Automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension to find status of Jiofi when connected, Automatically.

Features -
   Get remaining battery power of connected jiofi
   Notify user when power is less than 10 %

Currently supports Jiofi model 4 and 5 only.
